channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump administration fires 17 immigration court judges across ten states, union says
Oracle Drops $3 Billion Bombshell in Europe's AI Cloud War
Trump tells Texas Republicans to redraw the state congressional map to help keep House majority
New details revealed about California pot farm owner's ties to Newsom
Browns owners close on $25 million home after Ohio gives them $600 million for new stadium
Nextdoor CEO shares how the app is changing
item.description: Neighborhood social network app Nextdoor is getting a redesign with some new features. Nextdoor CEO Nirav Tolia joins CBS News to discuss.

item.title: House GOP hard-liners defy Trump, Speaker Johnson by crippling crypto measures
item.description: The intraparty rebellion comes after Trump urged the GOP to vote in favor of it.

item.title: Pam Bondi dodges questions on Epstein and Bongino amid Justice Department turmoil
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi refused to answer questions Tuesday about investigate files related to Jeffrey Epstein and her clash with a top FBI officia...

item.title: ICE says many in immigration detention no longer qualify for bond hearings
item.description: The Trump administration is reinterpreting a law from the 1990s, effectively making it harder for people facing deportation to be released from detent...

item.title: Senate to move on Trump request to cut foreign aid, public media funding
item.description: Some senators have concerns as Congress faces a Friday deadline to act on the rescissions request.

item.title: Stocks fall after report shows inflation increased in June
item.description: The Dow Jones finished the day down on Tuesday after new data showed inflation accelerated in June, rising 2.7% on an annual basis. CBS News MoneyWatc...

item.title: Trump says Bondi should release 'whatever she thinks is credible' on Epstein
item.description: President Donald Trump says Attorney General Pam Bondi should release "whatever she thinks is credible" on Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: WATCH: Portland WNBA team reveals new name, logo on ‘GMA’
item.description: The Portland Fire announced its new branding ahead of the franchise return.

item.title: 2 people found shot dead in home during welfare check in Los Angeles: Police
item.description: Police found the victims while responding to the home in Encino on Monday afternoon, according to the Los Angeles Police Department

item.title: Huge Mars meteorite expected to go for millions at auction
item.description: A 54-pound meteorite from Mars is expected to fetch up to $4 million when it goes up for auction on Wednesday at Sotheby's.

item.title: Assisted-living home cited for late reports of safety incidents years before fatal fire
WATCH: Miley Cyrus on what prevents her from touring
item.description: Cyrus told ABC News that she won’t be on a major tour anytime soon.

item.title: Judge says Trump administration can’t use travel ban to keep 80 refugees out of the US
